channel.title: Glassfish on Experiences of a developer
channel.description: Recent content in Glassfish on Experiences of a developer

item.title: My Glassfish support subscription came through - finally
item.description: Call me eager, call me insane, I had a JavaEE 6 app up and running in production on Glassfish 3.0 one month after it’s release. The improvements in JSF 2 and CDI were too compelling for me to hold off adopting, and sure enough, the application was quick and painless to develop. I did however pay a price for being an early adopter - a Glassfish / Weld bug was preventing my JSF login pages from working.
